overview: Colin Buchanan's bestselling DVD releases have brought Bible truths to the small screen in a truly unique way. Whether he's singing in the bush, discovering the spectacular Fraser Island, dressed as a caveman, riding his personal spaceman transportational device or tracking down a deadly inflatable crocodile, every Colin DVD is a creative adventure in discovering more of Jesus, his Word and His world. Now Colin has hand-picked a fun-filled collection of crazy, colourful clips and popped them on a specially-priced DVD - with the BONUS Live In Sydney 2000. Colin's Favourites DVD is the perfect tasty companion to Colin's Favourites CD. DURATION approx 70 tangy mins.
title: Colin's Favourites
